name: Exact Drive Inc.
tag_list: advertising, online-advertising, media-buying, digital-marketing, display-advertising, brand-advertising, internet-advertising, ad-agency, social-media, search-engine-marketing, search-marketing, pay-per-click, online-marketing
overview:
Online Advertising, Sharpened and Simplified.

Exact Drive delivers Internet marketing solutions that make it faster and easier to reach more people who are ready to embrace your brand. We plan, manage and optimize Internet advertising campaigns to provide the results you want — with an ROI that’s impressive.

We find audiences.

Need the undivided attention of a precise demographic group? Whether you want to connect with C-suite professionals, active travelers, tech-savvy teens, likely voters or anyone else, we’re happy to make the introduction. Online marketing campaigns planned, managed and optimized by Exact Drive ensure online ads target anyone, anywhere.

Get in the driver’s seat.

Advertisers traditionally have very little control over online ad campaigns. We think that’s a mistake. That’s why we let you determine targeting, inventory selection, placement and more. The result is a tailored campaign that aligns with your brand, budget and schedule.

We built a simple and transparent platform.

Exact Drive makes Internet marketing easy, and that’s no small feat. We packaged our unique approach in an intuitive tool that helps automate your campaign. The Exact Drive application guides you through the process of target selection, ad placement, scheduling and budgeting in a few simple steps. Our software includes everything you need to create and execute online marketing strategies that increase sales, attract new customers and open new channels.

  • Access careful, calculated control of all your ad buys
  • Evaluate results from a single ad or multiple campaigns
  • See changes take effect almost instantly
  • Get feedback in just minutes

Mobile Devices & Video

Get beyond banner advertising with mobile device placement and video delivery. Exact Drive can work with you to extend your online strategy and command attention using the latest channels.

Let’s work together.

Difference-making online marketing campaigns require innovative strategy, careful planning and insightful analysis. Exact Drive provides all three, making it easier for you to generate the results you want most.

LET US MANAGE YOUR CAMPAIGNS…

We work behind the scenes to plan, manage and execute successful Internet marketing campaigns, so you can focus on operational imperatives.

…OR USE OUR SOFTWARE FOR UNLIMITED CONTROL

The Exact Drive application enables precise control, so you can easily manage a single ad or multiple campaigns. Changes take effect fast and feedback is available in minutes.

Contact us request a demonstration.
